## Main Objective {.smaller visibility="uncounted"}

Provide a solid introduction to R programming with a focus on [Tidyverse](https://tidyverse.org/) principles and its ecosystem.

::: {.notes}
:::

## Learning Objectives {.smaller visibility="uncounted"}

1. Learn key concepts of computer science and programming.
2. Learn the structure and essential components of R programming language.
3. Learn tidyverse grammar for data manipulation.
4. Learn grammar of graphics for data exploration and visualization.
5. Learn tidymodels grammar for building statistical and predictive models.

::: {.notes}
:::

## Theoretical Basis {.smaller visibility="uncounted"}

1. Dialectical materialism [@engels2020a]
1. Cultural-historical theory [@vygotsky2012]
1. Pedagogy of autonomy/Dialectal pedagogy [@freire2011]
1. Dialectical unity in pedagogical activity [@bernardes2009a]

::: {.notes}
:::
